kpi.name: M1002C476

kpi_info.title: DCH SELECTED FOR BACKGROUND DUE TO MAX HSDPA USERS
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the DCH channel type is selected for background class connections due to maximum amount of HSDPA users or MAC-d flows in the WBTS, local cell group or cell. UPDATED:During the NRT channel type selection if the DCH channel type is selected due to maximum amount of HSDPA users or MAC-d flows in the WBTS, local cell group or cell.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH SELECTED FOR BACKGROUND DUE TO MAX HSDPA USERS
